                        :op1 "EEC"))

                  :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity

                        :unit (y / year)))
            :manner (f / frank))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (c / continue-01
                        :ARG1 (m3 / movement-07
                              :ARG1 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                                          :ARG2 (p4 / person
                                                :ARG1-of (o2 / originate-01

                                                            :op1 (c2 / country
                                                                  :name (n3 / name
                                                                        :op1 "Ireland"))
                                                            :op2 (c3 / country
                                                                  :name (n4 / name
                                                                        :op1 "UK")))))))))
                  :op2 (o3 / obligate-01
                        :ARG2 c))
            :snt3 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (h / have-polarity-91
                        :ARG2 -)
                  :op2 o3
                  :ARG2 c)))
